Table of Contents

Class CompositeDrawable

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Containers
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A drawable consisting of a composite of child drawables which are managed by the composite object itself. Transformations applied to a CompositeDrawable are also applied to its children. Additionally, CompositeDrawables support various effects, such as masking, edge effect, padding, and automatic sizing depending on their children.

public abstract class CompositeDrawable : Drawable, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, IDisposable, IDrawable, ITransformable, ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache, ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator

CompositeDrawable()

Constructs a CompositeDrawable that stores children.

Properties

AliveInternalChildren 

protected IReadOnlyList<Drawable> AliveInternalChildren { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyList<Drawable>

AutoSizeAxes

Controls which Axes are automatically sized w.r.t. InternalChildren. Children's BypassAutoSizeAxes are ignored for automatic sizing. Most notably, RelativePositionAxes and RelativeSizeAxes of children do not affect automatic sizing to avoid circular size dependencies. It is not allowed to manually set Size (or Width / Height) on any Axes which are automatically sized.

public virtual Axes AutoSizeAxes { get; protected set; }

Property Value

Axes

AutoSizeDuration

The duration which automatic sizing should take. If zero, then it is instantaneous. Otherwise, this is equivalent to applying an automatic size via a resize transform.

public float AutoSizeDuration { get; protected set; }

Property Value

float

AutoSizeEasing

The type of easing which should be used for smooth automatic sizing when AutoSizeDuration is non-zero.

public Easing AutoSizeEasing { get; protected set; }

Property Value

Easing

BorderColour

Determines the color of the border controlled by BorderThickness. Only has an effect when Masking is true.

public ColourInfo BorderColour { get; protected set; }

Property Value

ColourInfo

BorderThickness

Determines how thick of a border to draw around the inside of the masked region. Only has an effect when Masking is true. The border only is drawn on top of children using a sprite shader.

public float BorderThickness { get; protected set; }

Property Value

float

Remarks

Drawing borders is optimized heavily into our sprite shaders. As a consequence borders are only drawn correctly on top of quad-shaped children using our sprite shaders.

BoundingBox

Computes the bounding box of this drawable in its parent's space.

public override RectangleF BoundingBox { get; }

Property Value

RectangleF

CanBeFlattened

A flattened CompositeDrawable has its DrawNode merged into its parents'. In some cases, the DrawNode must always be generated and flattening should not occur.

protected virtual bool CanBeFlattened { get; }

Property Value

bool

ChildMaskingBounds

The RectangleF to be used as the masking bounds for all AliveInternalChildren.

public RectangleF ChildMaskingBounds { get; }

Property Value

RectangleF

ChildOffset

Positional offset applied to InternalChildren. Captures the effect of e.g. Padding.

public Vector2 ChildOffset { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

ChildSize

The size of the coordinate space revealed to InternalChildren. Captures the effect of e.g. Padding.

public Vector2 ChildSize { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

CornerExponent

Determines how gentle the curve of the corner straightens. A value of 2 (default) results in circular arcs, a value of 2.5 results in something closer to apple's "continuous corner". Values between 2 and 10 result in varying degrees of "continuousness", where larger values are smoother. Values between 1 and 2 result in a "flatter" appearance than round corners. Values between 0 and 1 result in a concave, round corner as opposed to a convex round corner, where a value of 0.5 is a circular concave arc. Only has an effect when Masking is true and CornerRadius is non-zero.

public float CornerExponent { get; protected set; }

Property Value

float

CornerRadius

Determines how large of a radius is masked away around the corners. Only has an effect when Masking is true.

public float CornerRadius { get; protected set; }

Property Value

float

Dependencies

Contains all dependencies that can be injected into this CompositeDrawable's children using BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute. Add or override dependencies by calling Cache(object).

public IReadOnlyDependencyContainer Dependencies { get; }

Property Value

IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

EdgeEffect

Determines an edge effect of this CompositeDrawable. Edge effects are e.g. glow or a shadow. Only has an effect when Masking is true.

public EdgeEffectParameters EdgeEffect { get; protected set; }

Property Value

EdgeEffectParameters

ForceLocalVertexBatch

Whether to use a local vertex batch for rendering. If false, a parenting vertex batch will be used.

public bool ForceLocalVertexBatch { get; protected set; }

Property Value

bool

InternalChildren

This CompositeDrawable list of children. Assigning to this property will dispose all existing children of this CompositeDrawable.

IEnumerable<Drawable>

Masking

If enabled, only the portion of children that falls within this CompositeDrawable's shape is drawn to the screen.

public bool Masking { get; protected set; }

Property Value

bool

MaskingSmoothness

Determines over how many pixels the alpha component smoothly fades out. Only has an effect when Masking is true.

public float MaskingSmoothness { get; protected set; }

Property Value

float

Padding

Shrinks the space children may occupy within this CompositeDrawable by the specified amount on each side.

public MarginPadding Padding { get; protected set; }

Property Value

MarginPadding

RelativeChildOffset

The offset of the relative position/size coordinate space of children of this CompositeDrawable. Children positioned at this offset will appear as if they were positioned at Position = osuTK.Vector2.Zero in this CompositeDrawable.

public Vector2 RelativeChildOffset { get; protected set; }

Property Value

Vector2

RelativeChildSize

The size of the relative position/size coordinate space of children of this CompositeDrawable. Children positioned at this size will appear as if they were positioned at Position = osuTK.Vector2.One in this CompositeDrawable.

public Vector2 RelativeChildSize { get; protected set; }

Property Value

Vector2

RelativeSizeAxes

Controls which Axes are relative sizes w.r.t. Parent's size (from 0 to 1) in the Parent's coordinate system, rather than absolute sizes. The Axes set in this property are ignored by automatically sizing parents.

public override Axes RelativeSizeAxes { get; set; }

Property Value

Axes

Remarks

If an axis becomes relatively sized and its component of Size was previously 0, then it automatically becomes 1. In all other cases Size is converted such that DrawSize remains invariant across changes of this property.

RelativeToAbsoluteFactor

Conversion factor from relative to absolute coordinates in our space.

public Vector2 RelativeToAbsoluteFactor { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

RemoveCompletedTransforms

Whether to remove completed transforms from the list of applicable transforms. Setting this to false allows for rewinding transforms.

This value is passed down to children. 

public override bool RemoveCompletedTransforms { get; }

Property Value

bool

RequiresChildrenUpdate

Specifies whether this CompositeDrawable requires an update of its children. If the return value is false, then children are not updated and UpdateAfterChildren() is not called.

protected virtual bool RequiresChildrenUpdate { get; }

Property Value

bool

SchedulerAfterChildren

A lazily-initialized scheduler used to schedule tasks to be invoked in future UpdateAfterChildren()s calls. The tasks are invoked at the beginning of the UpdateAfterChildren() method before anything else.

protected Scheduler SchedulerAfterChildren { get; }

Property Value

Scheduler

Size

Size of this Drawable in the Parent's coordinate system. May be in absolute or relative units (controlled by RelativeSizeAxes).

public override Vector2 Size { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

Width

X component of Size.

public override float Width { get; set; }

public override IDisposable BeginAbsoluteSequence(double newTransformStartTime, bool recursive = true)

Parameters

newTransformStartTime double

The new value for TransformStartTime.

recursive bool

IDisposable

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Absolute sequences should never be nested inside another existing sequence.

CheckChildrenLife()

Checks whether the alive state of any child has changed and processes it. This will add or remove children from aliveInternalChildren depending on their alive states.

Note that this does NOT check the load state of this CompositeDrawable to check if it can hold any alive children.

protected virtual bool CheckChildrenLife()

Returns

bool

Whether any child's alive state has changed.

IndexOfInternal(Drawable)

The index of a given child within InternalChildren.

protected int IndexOfInternal(Drawable drawable)

Parameters

drawable Drawable

Returns

int

If the child is found, its index. Otherwise, the negated index it would obtain if it were added to InternalChildren.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException
  • If the supplied drawable is already attached to another Parent.
  • If a child drawable was matched using Compare(Drawable, Drawable), but that child drawable was not the supplied drawable.

LoadAsyncComplete()

Invoked after dependency injection has completed for this Drawable and all children if this is a CompositeDrawable.

protected override void LoadAsyncComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked in the potentially asynchronous context of Load(IFrameBasedClock, IReadOnlyDependencyContainer, bool) prior to this Drawable becoming IsLoaded = true.

LoadComponentAsync<TLoadable>(TLoadable, Action<TLoadable>, CancellationToken, Scheduler)

Loads a future child or grand-child of this CompositeDrawable asynchronously. Dependencies and Clock are inherited from this CompositeDrawable.

Note that this will always use the dependencies and clock from this instance. If you must load to a nested container level, consider using DelayedLoadWrapper

protected Task LoadComponentAsync<TLoadable>(TLoadable component, Action<TLoadable> onLoaded = null, CancellationToken cancellation = default, Scheduler scheduler = null) where TLoadable : Drawable

Parameters

component TLoadable

The child or grand-child to be loaded.

onLoaded Action<TLoadable>

Callback to be invoked on the update thread after loading is complete.

cancellation CancellationToken

An optional cancellation token.

scheduler Scheduler

The scheduler for onLoaded to be invoked on. If null, the local scheduler will be used.

Returns

Task

The task which is used for loading and callbacks.

Type Parameters

TLoadable

The type of the future future child or grand-child to be loaded.

LoadComponent<TLoadable>(TLoadable)

Loads a future child or grand-child of this CompositeDrawable synchronously and immediately. Dependencies and Clock are inherited from this CompositeDrawable. This is generally useful if already in an asynchronous context and requiring forcefully (pre)loading content without adding it to the hierarchy. 

protected void LoadComponent<TLoadable>(TLoadable component) where TLoadable : Drawable

Parameters

component TLoadable

The child or grand-child to be loaded.

Type Parameters

TLoadable

The type of the future future child or grand-child to be loaded.

LoadComponentsAsync<TLoadable>(IEnumerable<TLoadable>, Action<IEnumerable<TLoadable>>, CancellationToken, Scheduler)

Loads several future child or grand-child of this CompositeDrawable asynchronously. Dependencies and Clock are inherited from this CompositeDrawable.

Note that this will always use the dependencies and clock from this instance. If you must load to a nested container level, consider using DelayedLoadWrapper

protected Task LoadComponentsAsync<TLoadable>(IEnumerable<TLoadable> components, Action<IEnumerable<TLoadable>> onLoaded = null, CancellationToken cancellation = default, Scheduler scheduler = null) where TLoadable : Drawable

Parameters

components IEnumerable<TLoadable>

The children or grand-children to be loaded.

onLoaded Action<IEnumerable<TLoadable>>

Callback to be invoked on the update thread after loading is complete.

cancellation CancellationToken

An optional cancellation token.

scheduler Scheduler

The scheduler for onLoaded to be invoked on. If null, the local scheduler will be used.

Returns

Task

The task which is used for loading and callbacks.

Type Parameters

TLoadable

The type of the future future child or grand-child to be loaded.

LoadComponents<TLoadable>(IEnumerable<TLoadable>)

Loads several future child or grand-child of this CompositeDrawable synchronously and immediately. Dependencies and Clock are inherited from this CompositeDrawable. This is generally useful if already in an asynchronous context and requiring forcefully (pre)loading content without adding it to the hierarchy. 

protected void LoadComponents<TLoadable>(IEnumerable<TLoadable> components) where TLoadable : Drawable

Parameters

components IEnumerable<TLoadable>

The children or grand-children to be loaded.

Type Parameters

TLoadable

The type of the future future child or grand-child to be loaded.

MakeChildAlive(Drawable)

Makes a child alive.

protected void MakeChildAlive(Drawable child)

Parameters

child Drawable

The child of this CompositeDrawable> to make alive.

Remarks

Callers have to ensure that child is of this CompositeDrawable's non-alive InternalChildren and LoadState of the child is at least Ready.

MakeChildDead(Drawable)

Makes a child dead (not alive) and removes it if RemoveWhenNotAlive of the child is set.

protected bool MakeChildDead(Drawable child)

Parameters

child Drawable

The child of this CompositeDrawable> to make dead.

Returns

bool

Whether child has been removed by death.

Remarks

Callers have to ensure that child is of this CompositeDrawable's AliveInternalChildren.

OnInvalidate(Invalidation, InvalidationSource)

Invoked when the layout of this Drawable was invalidated.

protected override bool OnInvalidate(Invalidation invalidation, InvalidationSource source)

Parameters

invalidation Invalidation

The flags that the this Drawable was invalidated with.

source InvalidationSource

The source that triggered the invalidation.

Returns

bool

Whether any custom invalidation was performed. Must be true if the DrawNode for this Drawable is to be invalidated.

Remarks

This should be used to perform any custom invalidation logic that cannot be described as a layout.

ReceivePositionalInputAtSubTree(Vector2)

Determines whether the subtree of this CompositeDrawable should receive positional input when the mouse is at the given screen-space position.

protected virtual bool ReceivePositionalInputAtSubTree(Vector2 screenSpacePos)

Parameters

screenSpacePos Vector2

The screen-space position where input could be received.

Returns

bool

True if the subtree should receive input at the given screen-space position.

Remarks

By default, the subtree of this CompositeDrawable always receives input when masking is turned off, and only receives input if this CompositeDrawable also receives input when masking is turned on.

RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry)

Invoked to register dependency activation functions for this object.

public override void RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry registry)

Parameters

registry IDependencyActivatorRegistry

The IDependencyActivatorRegistry to register activation functions with.

RemoveInternal(Drawable, bool)

Removes a given child from this InternalChildren.

protected virtual bool RemoveInternal(Drawable drawable, bool disposeImmediately)

Parameters

drawable Drawable

The Drawable to be removed.

disposeImmediately bool

Whether removed item should be immediately disposed.

Returns

bool

False if drawable was not a child of this CompositeDrawable and true otherwise.

ShouldBeConsideredForInput(Drawable)

protected virtual bool ShouldBeConsideredForInput(Drawable child)

Parameters

child Drawable

The drawable to be evaluated.

Returns

bool

Whether or not the specified drawable should be considered when building input queues.

SortInternal()

Sorts all children of this CompositeDrawable.

protected void SortInternal()

Remarks

This can be used to re-sort the children if the result of Compare(Drawable, Drawable) has changed.

UpdateAfterAutoSize()

Invoked after all autosize calculations have taken place.

protected virtual void UpdateAfterAutoSize()

UpdateAfterChildren()

An opportunity to update state once-per-frame after Update() has been called for all InternalChildren. This is invoked prior to any autosize calculations of this CompositeDrawable.

protected virtual void UpdateAfterChildren()

UpdateAfterChildrenLife()

Invoked after UpdateChildrenLife() and IsPresent state checks have taken place, but before UpdateSubTree() is invoked for all InternalChildren. This occurs after Update() has been invoked on this CompositeDrawable

protected virtual void UpdateAfterChildrenLife()

UpdateChildrenLife()

Updates the life status of InternalChildren according to their ShouldBeAlive property.

protected virtual bool UpdateChildrenLife()

Returns

bool

True iff the life status of at least one child changed.

UpdateSubTree()

Updates this Drawable and all Drawables further down the scene graph. Called once every frame.

public override bool UpdateSubTree()

Returns

bool

False if the drawable should not be updated.

UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Updates all masking calculations for this CompositeDrawable and its AliveInternalChildren. This occurs post-UpdateSubTree() to ensure that all Drawable updates have taken place.

public override bool UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Returns

bool

Whether masking calculations have taken place.
